articles.author: Jones Hayden
articles.title: Russia takes full control of Avdiivka, as Kyiv decries 'artificial deficit' in ammo - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “Ukrainian soldiers had to ration ammunition due to dwindling supplies,” US President Biden says in pushing for approval of more American aid.
articles.content: U.S. President Joe Biden said "Ukrainian soldiers had to ration ammunition due to dwindling supplies as a result of congressional inaction, resulting in Russias first notable gains in months." Biden … [+1286 chars]
